content: these are row and rounds that have the same amount of stitches that you work to simply increase the length of something pattern start nelly s dress ch17 not too tightly chain should fit around doll s neck if not go up in hook size until it does row 1 work 2hdc into the second chain from the hook work 2hdc into each of the remaining 15chs across turn 32sts row 2 ch1 single_crochet into each of the first 7sts work 2sc into the next st *single_crochet into each of the next 7sts work 2sc into the next st repeat from * across turn 36sts row 3 ch1 half_double_crochet in each of next 5sts ch5 skip 8sts half_double_crochet in each of next 10sts ch5 skip 8sts half_double_crochet in each of remaining 5sts turn 20sts and two ch5 spaces row 4 ch1 single_crochet into each st and chain across turn 30sts round 5 ch1 half_double_crochet in each st across join the last st to first with a slip_stitch 30sts now is a good time to try the dress onto your doll to check the fit if it s too tight simply re work the yoke in a larger hook size before continuing… round 6 ch1 half_double_crochet in first st 2hdc in next st *half_double_crochet in next st 2hdc in next st repeat from * around join last st to first with a slip_stitch 45sts rounds 7-14 or to desired length ch1 half_double_crochet in each st around joining last st to first with a slip_stitch 45sts optional hem trim - change yarn to a contrasting colour ch1 and work tw single_crochet see special stitches in each st around 45sts alternatively just slip_stitch loosely around to neaten the edge or fasten_off if you find it hard to slip_stitch loosely fasten_off and hide loose ends right sleeve edging attach yarn to back right sleeve opening work a tw single_crochet see special stitches into each of the unworked sts across the top of the arm hole do not work all the way around before you fasten_off slip_stitch back into the bottom of the last st then fasten_off and hide loose ends left sleeve edging attach yarn to front left sleeve opening work a tw single_crochet into each of the unworked sts across the top of the arm hole do not work all the way around before you fasten_off slip_stitch back into the bottom of the last st then fasten off and hide loose ends nelly s mary jane shoes nelly s shoes are worked in joined rounds at the end of each round join the last st to the first with a slip_stitch round 1 magic_ring ch1 not a stitch from now on work 5hdc join as above 5sts round 2 ch1 work 2hdc in each st around join 10sts round 3 ch1 work 2hdc in each st around join 20sts round 4 ch1 half_double_crochet into the back loop only of each st around join 20sts rnds 5 ch1 half_double_crochet into each st around join
